In early October I was asked to give an eight-to-ten-minute presentation summing up the year for UX. A tall order, but I embraced blazing through the content to alight briefly on things I though the general company audience should know about UX and how we were trying to help.

With most of our work going toward rewrites that have not yet launched thereâ€™s little to say about outcomes, so I followed a rapid tour of our outputs with a couple of quick demos and an invitation to view my upcoming Cayuse Connect Conference talk about UX philosophy and practice.
